## Early Warnings. Strategic Insight.

*Forisca* is a political risk consultancy specializing in AI-powered early warning systems and forecasting tools for protests, instability, and regime change.
We combine advanced machine learning models with expert political analysis to deliver timely, actionable insights to institutions operating in volatile environments.
With a regional focus on Sub-Saharan Africa and the MENA region, Forisca supports decision-makers in navigating complex risks through real-time dashboards, tailored briefings, and predictive intelligence.
